summary: A night club owner becomes infatuated with a torch singer and frames his best friend/manager for embezzlement when the chanteuse falls in love with him.
cast: Ida Lupino|Cornel Wilde|Celeste Holm|Richard Widmark|O.Z. Whitehead|Robert Karnes|George Beranger|Ian MacDonald|Grandon Rhodes|Louis Bacigalupi|Edgar Caldwell|Robert Cherry|Heinie Conklin|Clancy Cooper|Jack Edwards Jr.|Charles Flynn|Robert Foulk|Douglas Gerrard|Kathleen Hughes|Geraldine Jordan|Don Kohler|Jack G. Lee|Lee MacGregor|Marion Marshall|James Metcalf|Tom Moore|Kathleen O'Malley|Harry Seymour|Blanche Taylor|Ray Teal|Cecil Weston
title: El parador del camino
